admission_text:
[Home](https://comofriends.org/) » [Support](https://comofriends.org/support/) » Membership

#  Membership

Como Friends Members Make It Possible

Your Como Friends membership keeps Como Park Zoo & Conservatory free and accessible, every day of the year.

Choose

Membership

Membership 

[ Senior Membership ]( https://comofriends.org/support/membership/senior-membership/) [ Additional Member Discounts ]( https://comofriends.org/support/membership/member-discounts/)

##  Membership

As a member of Como Friends, you’re carrying on a century-long tradition of community support for Como, providing the extra resources the historic Como Zoo and the Marjorie McNeely Conservatory need to grow and thrive.

Senior Citizens are eligible for $10 off any level—just click on “Senior Membership.”

Waive benefits at the Supporter level and above for 100% tax-deductibility and you will still receive Como Friends membership card and all associated privileges. To waive benefits, please call Como Friends at 651-487-8229 or email [comomembership@comofriends.org](mailto:comomembership@comofriends.org).

  * ###  Basic Membership Benefits

    * Invitations to Special Access events throughout the year
    * Subscription to the _Como Friends Insider_
    * Free or reduced admission to hundreds of partner zoos, aquariums and botanical gardens (Please call prior to visiting a participating institution to verify the reciprocal benefit offered) See list of participating zoos: [AZA Reciprocal Admissions ...
collections_text:
#  Our Mission

##  We inspire community generosity in support of Como Park Zoo & Conservatory so it thrives for generations to come.

[ Watch the Video](https://www.youtube.com/embed/AQ43cZrmdc8?autoplay=1)

OUR VISION & VALUES

##  A Powerful Partnership

At Como Friends, we envision a future in which Como Park Zoo & Conservatory is a global leader in conservation, animal care and horticulture with barrier-free access for all.

###  Champion Conservation

By inspiring community support for Como Park Zoo & Conservatory, we ensure the next generation learns to care for the wonders of nature. 

###  Advance Equity

To make sure every visitor is valued at Como, we embrace and serve our diverse community by protecting free access for all. 

###  Embrace Innovation

From naturalistic new habitats to cutting-edge animal and plant care, your support helps Como Park Zoo & Conservatory grow and thrive. 

HOW TO SUPPORT

Donate

Donate 

Planned Gifts 

Membership 

Garden Safari Gifts 

Events 

Corporate Partnerships 

### Support Como Friends

Like all treasures, Como Park Zoo & Conservatory requires a special kind of care—a constant presence committed to safeguarding its history and securing its future. Thanks to your support for Como Friends, the historic Como Zoo and the Marjorie McNeely Conservatory have the resources they need to thrive.

[ Make A Donation](https://comofriends.org/support/donate/)

### Planned Gifts are a Way to Leave a Legacy
